title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 14.1 - School buildings and grounds
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 14.1 - School buildings and grounds

State Regulations
(a) Regulations. The commissioner shall make regulations governing the requirements
for the plans and specifications for the erection, repair, enlargement and
remodeling of school buildings. (b) General requirement. Each school district shall provide suitable and adequate
school buildings and grounds for the instruction and accommodation of the
pupils of such district. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
14.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
